name: Icewind Dale: Heart of Winter
description:
Icewind Dale: Heart of Winter is a RPG game developed by Black Isle Studios. It came out on 01-02-2001. Interplay Productions published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Icewind Dale: Heart of Winter is available on PC.
It was produced by Chris Parker and Darren Monahan. Jeremy Soule scored the game.
